posts.post_content:
Broadleaf 15-count pack: $1000 net to me. (SOLD) Nearly impossible to find a BL pack in better shape than this. There is a date on the stamp, which I believe is 1916 or 1918. T206 were found in 10-count packs, but good luck finding one of those. Found in a wall in upstate NY during a renovation.

Broadleaf 20-count pack: $200 net to me. (SOLD) This might be the only 20-count BL pack. Condition is really rough. There is no date on the stamp, but I think it is also a late teens stamp. Found tucked under a windowsill in upstate NY.

Recruit 10-count pack: $25 net to me. Date is tough to read, but I think it is from the 1920s (maybe 1926).
